entries.title_d: The Debris Cult have been religiously gathering large quanities of valuable Death Star debris and shipping them out of the system. While the Empire has no idea what the Scavengers are planning to do with the debris they have collected, they do not want to lose the valuable salvage. You must capture these fleeing freighters and bring their cargo back for the Empire.
entries.title: Yavin System: Capture the Debris Cult Freighter Duty
entries.thanks_5: You have added to the scrap. For that you have my thanks.
entries.thanks_4: We should join them in the eternal float of debris.
entries.thanks_3: Another beautiful explosion. Not as big as the big bang but still very nice.
entries.thanks_2: We should join them in the eternal float of debris.
entries.thanks_1: You have added to the scrap. For that you have my thanks.
entries.taunt_5: Prepare to become part of the debris field.
entries.taunt_3: We shall turn you into salvage.
entries.taunt_2: You will regret messing with us.
entries.target_disabled: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#00ff00 The scavenger's ship has been temporarily disabled. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.recovery_success: The scavenger's cargo has been secured. Good job, pilot.
entries.quest_recover_d: Once the freighter is disabled, move in close, and wait for the capture process to begin.
entries.quest_location_d: Once you have entered the Yavin system you will receive a navigation waypoint to the location of a freighter trying to leave the system.
entries.quest_escort_d: Once the freighter is captured, follow it until it is safely back in Imperial hands. The Scavengers are surely going to try to recapture their vessel so be on your guard.
entries.quest_disable_d: You will need to disable the freighter in order to capture it.
entries.panic_5: Yes, allow me to join the scrap.
entries.panic_4: Yes, destroy us! We will be one with the field.
entries.panic_3: We must be destroyed and float for eternity.
entries.panic_1: Yes, allow me to join the scrap.
entries.failed_escape: The scavenger has escaped the area. Return to base.
entries.failed_destroy: The scavenger was destroyed! We want to recover the salvage, not wipe it out. Return to base for debriefing.
entries.escort_wiped_out: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#00ff00 The scavenger's escort has been eliminated. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.escort_remaining: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#00ff00 %DI ships remain in the scavenger's escort. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.complete_5: Nice work, pilot. We have recovered the freighter and it contains a great deal of our missing salvage.
entries.complete_4: Nice work, pilot. We have recovered the freighter and it contains a great deal of our missing salvage.
entries.complete_3: Nice work, pilot. We have recovered the freighter and it contains a great deal of our missing salvage.
entries.complete_2: Nice work, pilot. We have recovered the freighter and it contains a great deal of our missing salvage.
entries.complete_1: Nice work, pilot. We have recovered the freighter and it contains a great deal of our missing salvage.
entries.complete: Nice work, pilot. We have recovered the freighter and it contains a great deal of our missing salvage.
entries.capture_started: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#00ff00 The scavenger freighter had been powered down. Prepare to program auto pilot.\#pcontrast3 >
entries.capture_phase_2_5: I cannot control my own ship! Just destroy me and allow me to return to scrap!
entries.capture_phase_2_4: I cannot control my own ship! Just destroy me and allow me to return to scrap!
entries.capture_phase_2_3: I cannot control my own ship! Just destroy me and allow me to return to scrap!
entries.capture_phase_2_2: I cannot control my own ship! Just destroy me and allow me to return to scrap!
entries.capture_phase_2_1: I cannot control my own ship! Just destroy me and allow me to return to scrap!
entries.capture_phase_2: I cannot control my own ship! Just destroy me and allow me to return to scrap!
entries.capture_phase_1_5: What have you done? Why are you reprogramming my auto pilot?
entries.capture_phase_1_4: What have you done? Why are you reprogramming my auto pilot?
entries.capture_phase_1_3: What have you done? Why are you reprogramming my auto pilot?
entries.capture_phase_1_2: What have you done? Why are you reprogramming my auto pilot?
entries.capture_phase_1_1: What have you done? Why are you reprogramming my auto pilot?

entries.capture_complete: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#00ff00 The scavenger will now follow us. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:\#pcontrast3 <Alert! Debris Cult fighters incoming. Prepare to defend captured vessel.>
entries.arrival_phase_2: Debris Cult freighter located. Disable the scavenger and capture the ship!
entries.arrival_phase_1: Scanning system for Debris Cult freighters.
entries.abort: Roger, abort code received. Heading home...
